name: DHP_Sophia_Grey_Linen_Upholstered_Daybed_and_Trundle
reviews: We purchased this as a guest bed for our office/guest bedroom. It Took my boyfriend and I about an hour to put together, directions were easy to follow. We purchased a twin sized memory foam mattress and it is extremely comfortable to sleep on. I would also venture to say there weight rating is slightly underestimated as I and my boyfriend laid on the bed together and our combined weight is close to 350 pounds, it held us just fine.
Good Price value for a daybed. Looks great. Set up took 2 people as described.
description: Built of solid construction with elegant wooden scroll legs, the twin size daybed and trundle have multiple wooden slats which eliminate the need for a box spring. With its backless design, the DHP Sophia daybed is a versatile accent piece to place against the wall or use as a room divider. A comfy lounge space by day and sleep space by night.Set includes: One (1) Daybed and One (1) TrundleBackless daybed includes a roll-out trundle ideal for sleepovers or overnight guestsA beautiful accent piece to place against the wall or use as a room dividerSlightly sleighed arms for a contemporary chic lookIncludes wooden slats to provide support and comfortAccommodates two (2) twin mattresses (sold separately)The daybed has a weight limit of 400 pounds while the trundle has a weight limit of 225 pounds.Materials: Wood, metal, fabricFinish: LinenUpholstery color: GreyUpholstery fill: FoamWeight: 105.5 lbs.Daybed dimensions: 34.5 inches high x 89 inches wide x 42 inches deepTrundle dimensions: 11 inches high x 75 inches wide x 40.5 inches deepMaterialLinen, Metal, WoodFinishGrey FinishBed StyleDaybedAssemblyAssembly RequiredColorGreyFurniture PatternSolidProduct FeaturesIncludes Hardware
